meanings.sent1: The unorganized room had clothes scattered everywhere.
meanings.sent2: Her unorganized desk made it hard to find anything.
meanings.sent3: The unorganized party turned into chaos when no one knew what to do.
meanings.sent4: His unorganized thoughts made it difficult to focus on the task at hand.
meanings.sent5: The unorganized schedule caused confusion among the team members.
